name: Watermelon the last Pumpkinbender
description:
There are rumours that the last Pumpkinbender will come back and destroy the lord Pumpkins empire. But those are only rumors. Or is they...?

You should bit the Watermelon by traps and than kill him by your mighty pumpkinbending.

Click to traps - to activate them.

[Boss Fight] Arrows - move, LCtrl - fire. [Boss Fight]
